attributes.action: provide the funds to MoD to maintain TA training.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Territorial Army is a vital part of the British Army. Any reduction in training will have severe effects on operations in Afghanistan.  A reduction in training will make it more difficult to maintain a well trained reserve force, causing people to leave or their skills to fatigue. The PM should tell the treasury to provide emergency funds to MoD and to make cuts elsewhere if necessary.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
